sentences: Choi Min-ho (Hangul: 최민호; born February 17, 1983), better known by his stage name Minos (Hangul: 마이노스), is a South Korean rapper.
Minos debuted in 1999 as a member of the Daegu-based hip hop duo Virus with rapper Mecca.
They released their first and only EP, Pardon Me?, in 2003.
In 2006, Minos and rapper Kebee created the hip hop duo Eluphant.
